explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses group activity recognition (GAR) which is a machine learning task.
explanations.deep learning: The proposed method, TCSE-CGN, is a deep learning network for GAR.
explanations.neural network: The paper proposes a novel neural network architecture for weakly supervised group activity recognition.
explanations.attention mechanism: The Spatial Enhancement Stream uses an attention mechanism to enhance features.
explanations.feature learning: The paper focuses on learning representative features from RGB frames for activity recognition.
explanations.feature representation: The method involves extracting and enhancing features from RGB frames.
explanations.representation learning: The network learns hidden semantic temporal information and representative features.
